channel.title: Amao's Casual Writing
channel.description: Recent content on Amao's Casual Writing

item.title: WHOIAM
item.description: I am studying for Master degree of Distributed Systems in KTH Royal Institute of Technology. I am a believer/user of Arch Linux, I dare not presume to say I am well-known Linux, I had used Arch Linux as my main system for 3 years, then I switch back to the Microsoft Windows after Microsoft began to do some right things. Now I work on Arch Linux as WSL and a plan-b system.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
